column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I arrived early and had a Dark and Stormy at the bar while I waited for my +1. The bartenders were all very social and we chatted a bit while he mixed the drink. The beverage was exceptional - mixed strong
column2: but without overpowering the balance of the ingredients and piled high with crushed ice. Shortly after finishing
column3: our table became available and we moved on to the main event. While upstairs has a warm glow and air of regality (without being overbearing)
column4: the table we were seated at downstairs had a more intimate feel - the chandeliers
column5: oaken seats and soft light featured on the main floor were largely replaced by candlelight
column6: velvet chairs and broader tables for larger parties.
